Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2012 02:18AM HangingOn2778 wrote: I'm also in the Cincinnati area!  I'm just finished my 3rd round of TAC X 6 chemo and it wiped me out.  I hope the others don't get worse.  After that I will have a double mastectomy and then my ovaries removed since I found out I am BRCA positive.  I just want to do everything I can to increase my odds of watching my 1 yr old and 3 yr old grow up! :)
Posts.Title: Ohio Chemo Sisters Kelloggs Kelloggs
